queries.query: select count(distinct m.patient_hid) as v1 from medication as m join encounter as e on m.encounter_id = e.encounter_id join drug as d on m.drug_id = d.drug_uuid join patient as p on e.patient_hid = p.patient_hid where month(m.datetime) = month(':paramStartDate:') and year(m.datetime) = year(':paramStartDate:') and e.facility_id = ':paramFacilityId:' and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, date(p.dob), date(e.encounter_datetime)) between 0 and 11 and d.name = 'BCG';

select count(distinct m.patient_hid) as v1 from medication as m join encounter as e on m.encounter_id = e.encounter_id join drug as d on m.drug_id = d.drug_uuid join patient as p on e.patient_hid = p.patient_hid where month(m.datetime) = month(':paramStartDate:') and year(m.datetime) = year(':paramStartDate:') and e.facility_id = ':paramFacilityId:' and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, date(p.dob), date(e.encounter_datetime)) between 12 and 23 and d.name = 'BCG';

select count(distinct m.patient_hid) as v1 from medication as m join encounter as e on m.encounter_id = e.encounter_id join drug as d on m.drug_id = d.drug_uuid join patient as p on e.patient_hid = p.patient_hid where month(m.datetime) = month(':paramStartDate:') and year(m.datetime) = year(':paramStartDate:') and e.facility_id = ':paramFacilityId:' and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, date(p.dob), date(e.encounter_datetime)) between 0 and 11 and d.name = 'MR';

select count(distinct pdd.patient_hid) as v1 from patient_death_details pdd join encounter e on pdd.encounter_id = e.encounter_id join patient as p on e.patient_hid = p.patient_hid where TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, date(p.dob), date(pdd.date_of_death)) < 5 and month(pdd.date_of_death) = month(':paramStartDate:') and year(pdd.date_of_death) = year(':paramStartDate:') and e.facility_id = ':paramFacilityId:';
